item.title: KVM RHCOS PXE Boot
item.description: KVM RHCOS PXE Boot We will create a KVM network called mylab and launch a RHCOS instance using PXE boot. We will use KVM’s integrated DHCP and TFTP server. Prerequisites: Linux system with kvm/libvirt installed (using Ubuntu 20.04 for this example). 3GB RAM for the VM. Steps Create a libvirt network with static DHCP and TFTP settings Download initramfs, kernel and rootfs Prepare a TFTP server for hosting initramfs (initrd.
